title: Bright, bold and surprisingly easy: 4 new season eye make-up looks you need to try
text:
Bright, bold and detailed, these are not your average eye looks, but you don’t have to be a professional to achieve them. Chanel’s make-up ambassador Mary Greenwell makes standout shadow a cinch.

The new smoky eye is...anything but black

For high drama, start with your usual neutral shade on lids, then pick two complementary colours – depending on how bold you’re feeling – and sweep one above the socket line and the other below the lower lid. It’s that easy.

‘Blend upwards from the socket line so the colour disappears into the brow bone,’ says Mary Greenwell. ‘And use a more precise brush to apply the second colour under the eyes, starting at the outer corners. It takes no more than five minutes.’...
description: Bright, bold and detailed, these are not your average eye looks, but you don’t have to be a professional to achieve them.
